Posts.Content: warren3 wrote: I had a needle biopsy last week and it was extemely painful.  They had to move it around the first time and then they had to remove it and try again.  I am still quite bruised from the surgery to remove the tumor and margins.  I am terrified that the needle will hurt for the sentinal node biopsy.  I understand that they do not do it under any anesthesia at this hospital.  I am so afraid!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Can anyone tell me what I will experience? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Fear of sentinal node biopsy warren3 2Hands4me
